name: Karen Scott
description:
This is a pair of women's pants made by Karen Scott in a size petite large. 
 The pants are black and feature an elastic waistline and 4 faux pockets. 
 They measure about 15.25 across the waist with a 23.5 inseam and a 9.75 rise when laid flat 
 These pants were made in Vietnam and are made of a 68/27/5 rayon/nylon/spandex blend. 
 The garmet comes in good pre-owned condition.
